description:
The Airget lamh was the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] flagship of Vice Admiral http://anidb.net/ch751 [Edwin Fischer]. Pennant number BG-20.
The Airget lamh served as a squadron flagship, and was part of the http://anidb.net/ch96406 [Yang Fleet] by 796 UC. It engaged the 11th Fleet in the Battle of Doria, where Commodore Fischer`s squadron participated in the encirclement of the http://anidb.net/ch96433 [11th Fleet].
In 798 UC, it defended http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] at the Eighth Battle of Iserlohn, and again in the Ninth Battle of Iserlohn when High Admiral http://anidb.net/ch194 [Reuenthal] attacked the fortress as part of Operation Ragnarok from late 798 UC to early 799 UC.
Joining the rest of the Yang Fleet in evacuating the fortress, the Airget lamh fought in the subsequent battles of the war leading up to the Battle of Vermilion in 799 UC.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Airget lamh
